description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a, line 2. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the second flyleaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 28 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Origin: 2 Ramaḍān 1268 H [20 June 1852] (leaf 238b). Incipit: باب ادلة الاحكام قال الله تعالى ليهلك من هلك عن بينة ويحيى من حي عن بينة
author: Mujāhid, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
abstract: Second half of a work on uṣūl al-fiqh, beginning with Bāb adillat al-aḥkām; preceded by a fihrist on leaves 1(bis)b-1a.
extent: 239 leaves : paper ; 301 x 201 (194 x 108) mm bound to 303 x 205 mm
creator: Mujāhid, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
مجاهد، محمد بن علي، 1766 or 1767-1826 or 1827
subject: Islamic law—Interpretation and construction
binding_note: Full olive green leather with blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets.
call_number: Oversize Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 531q
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
